# Data Source: aws_ssoadmin_principal_application_assignments

Terraform data source for viewing AWS SSO Admin Principal Application Assignments.

## Example Usage

### Basic Usage

```typescript
// DO NOT EDIT. Code generated by 'cdktf convert' - Please report bugs at https://cdk.tf/bug
import { Construct } from "constructs";
import { Fn, Token, TerraformStack } from "cdktf";
/*
 * Provider bindings are generated by running `cdktf get`.
 * See https://cdk.tf/provider-generation for more details.
 */
import { DataAwsSsoadminPrincipalApplicationAssignments } from "./.gen/providers/aws/data-aws-ssoadmin-principal-application-assignments";
class MyConvertedCode extends TerraformStack {
  constructor(scope: Construct, name: string) {
    super(scope, name);
    new DataAwsSsoadminPrincipalApplicationAssignments(this, "example", {
      instanceArn: Token.asString(Fn.lookupNested(Fn.tolist(test.arns), ["0"])),
      principalId: Token.asString(awsIdentitystoreUserTest.userId),
      principalType: "USER",
    });
  }
}

```

## Argument Reference

The following arguments are required:

* `instanceArn` - (Required) ARN of the instance of IAM Identity Center.
* `principalId` - (Required) An identifier for an object in IAM Identity Center, such as a user or group.
* `principalType` - (Required) Entity type for which the assignment will be created. Valid values are `USER` or `GROUP`.

## Attribute Reference

This data source exports the following attributes in addition to the arguments above:

* `applicationAssignments` - List of principals assigned to the application. See the [`applicationAssignments` attribute reference](#application_assignments-attribute-reference) below.

### `applicationAssignments` Attribute Reference

* `applicationArn` - ARN of the application.
* `principalId` - An identifier for an object in IAM Identity Center, such as a user or group.
* `principalType` - Entity type for which the assignment will be created. Valid values are `USER` or `GROUP`.
